mapper.insert: insert into instance_alert_configs() values(#{alertConfig},#{alertValue},#{configInfo},#{type},#{instanceId},#{status},#{compareType}, #{checkCycle},#{updateTime},#{lastCheckTime}) on duplicate key update alert_value = #{alertValue},check_cycle = #{checkCycle}, update_time = now(),status = #{status},last_check_time=now()
mapper.select: select id, from instance_alert_configs where id = #{id}
select id, from instance_alert_configs where type = #{type}
select id, from instance_alert_configs where alert_config = #{alertConfig}
mapper.update: update instance_alert_configs set alert_value = #{alertValue}, check_cycle = #{checkCycle} where id = #{id}
update instance_alert_configs set last_check_time = #{lastCheckTime} where id = #{id}
